data.actual_result: Search options window remains. It can only be dismissed by clicking in and out of the search bar, clicking outside makes it reappear after a while.
data.expected_result: Search options window goes away because the bar becomes unfocused
data.short_description: "Search Options" window doesn't go away when moving chats via a notification
data.steps_to_repro: - Click in search bar to open options window - Receive a desktop notification - Click through to the chat it's from
